title: CNET Published AI-Generated Stories. Then Its Staff Pushed Back
description: Like Hollywood's striking screenwriters, the outlet's employees want protections against potentially job-killing automation.

title: Autonomous Worlds Aim to Free Online Games From Corporate Control
description: Multiplayer titles like Minecraft encourage creativity, but prototype games built on the blockchain claim to give players more meaningful independence.

title: This Is Catfishing on an Industrial Scale
description: Hired as customer service reps, these freelancers were instead tasked with luring in the lonely and lovestruck through a network of dating and hookup sites.
